testimonials.name: Jennifer M.
testimonials.testimonial: Mint Tile did an amazing job with our master bathroom renovation. The tile work is absolutely beautiful and their attention to detail is impressive. They were professional, clean, and completed the job on schedule.

testimonials.name: Robert T.
testimonials.testimonial: We hired Mint Tile for our kitchen backsplash and couldn't be happier with the results. Their team was knowledgeable, efficient, and the quality of work exceeded our expectations. Would highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.testimonial: Mint Tile installed porcelain tile throughout our first floor and did a fantastic job. They were reliable, hardworking, and the finished product looks amazing. We'll definitely use them for future projects.

testimonials.name: Michael D.
testimonials.testimonial: The team at Mint Tile transformed our outdated shower into a modern masterpiece. Their craftsmanship is exceptional and they were a pleasure to work with throughout the entire process.

testimonials.name: Lisa W.
testimonials.testimonial: We couldn't be happier with our new outdoor patio tiles. Mint Tile helped us select the perfect weather-resistant option and installed everything flawlessly. Our outdoor space is now our favorite part of the home!

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.testimonial: As a business owner, I needed tile work that could withstand heavy foot traffic while looking professional. Mint Tile delivered exactly what I needed, on time and within budget. Their commercial expertise is impressive.
